main event: A round, metallic gray UFO was observed hovering silently over the Fairfield, Illinois airport for about 15 minutes before accelerating at a high rate of speed and disappearing from view.
interesting points: The UFO was approximately 50 to 75 feet in diameter and had no visible markings or other identifying features.
The sighting occurred on August 6, 1963 at around 2200 hours.
The weather conditions were clear with good visibility at the time of the incident.
The incident has been logged into the files of Project Blue Book for further investigation.
photographs: yes, 1 photograph included in the report
